abilities.name: ***Multiattack.***
abilities.ability: The Akk Dog attacks once with its claws and once with its tail.

actions.name: ***Claws.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, one target. *Hit* 12 slashing (2d8 + 3)

actions.name: ***Tail.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 9 bludgeoning (1d10 + 3)
